title: Topic 006 Question 014
body: You have an Azure IoT solution that contains an Azure IoT hub and 100 IoT devices. The devices run Windows Server 2016.
You need to deploy the Azure Defender for IoT C#-based security agent to the devices.
options: On the devices, initialize Trusted Platform Module (TPM).
From the IoT hub, create a system-assigned managed identity.
From the IoT hub, create a security module for the devices.
On the devices, set the PowerShell execution policy to Restricted.
